title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog, there are a few issues:

a. The buttons are too small.

b. When the dialog pops up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

d. The dialog comes up very large for methods with many parameters.

To fix these issues:

i. Perform duplicated name validation on the first page of the dialog.

ii. Merge the first and second columns in the dialog.
OB:
a. Buttons are too small.

b. When the dialog pops up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

d. The dialog comes up very large for methods with many parameters.
EB:
The buttons should be of an appropriate size.

When the dialog pops up, the first table entry should be selected and only the relevant move button should be enabled.

The preview should display the complete parameter name even when it is very long.

The dialog should have a size that is suitable for displaying methods with many parameters.
SR:
1. Open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog.

2. Observe the size of the buttons.

3. Observe the initial selection in the parameter table.

4. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe the preview.

5. Open the dialog for a method with many parameters and observe its size.
